meanings.sent1: She listened tolerantly to her friend's differing opinion.

meanings.definition: Showing acceptance or openness towards different beliefs or practices
meanings.sent1: The tolerant teacher welcomed all students into her classroom.
meanings.sent2: She had a tolerant attitude towards people of different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The tolerant community embraced diversity and inclusion.
meanings.sent4: His tolerant nature made him a beloved leader among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The tolerant society celebrated individuality and freedom of expression.
